com.compendium.core.db
Class DBSearch

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.db.DBSearch

public class DBSearch
extends java.lang.Object

The DBSearch class serves as the interface layer to make queries and searches into the the database.

searchExactNodeLabel

public static java.util.Vector searchExactNodeLabel(DBConnection dbcon,
                                                    java.lang.String sText,
                                                    int nType,
                                                    java.lang.String userID)
                                             throws java.sql.SQLException
Return all nodes whose labels EQUAL the passed text.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
text, - the text to match.
type, - the type of the node to filter the search on.
Returns:
Vector, of NodeSummary objects whose label matches the given text.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

nType, - the type of the node to filter the search on.

searchTransclusions

public static java.util.Vector searchTransclusions(DBConnection dbcon,
                                                   java.lang.String text,
                                                   java.lang.String sNodeID,
                                                   int type,
                                                   java.lang.String userID)
                                            throws java.sql.SQLException
Return all nodes whose labels start with the passed text, and have the passed node type.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
text, - the text to match.
sNodeID, - the id of the node being matched that therefore needs to be excluded from the results.
type, - the type of the node to filter the search on.
Returns:
Vector, of NodeSummary objects whose label start with the given text.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

searchAttribute

public static java.util.Enumeration searchAttribute(DBConnection dbcon,
                                                    java.lang.String contextCondition,
                                                    java.lang.String viewID,
                                                    java.util.Vector vtSelectedNodeTypes,
                                                    java.util.Vector vtSelectedAuthors,
                                                    java.util.Vector vtSelectedCodes,
                                                    int matchCodesCondition,
                                                    java.util.Vector vKeywords,
                                                    int matchKeywordCondition,
                                                    java.util.Vector attrib,
                                                    java.util.Date beforeCreationDate,
                                                    java.util.Date afterCreationDate,
                                                    java.util.Date beforeModificationDate,
                                                    java.util.Date afterModificationDate,
                                                    java.lang.String userID)
                                             throws java.sql.SQLException
Searches the node table for nodes that satisfy user query conditions.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
contextCondition - three choices -- search only in current view or home window /all views/all views and deleted objects -- refer const string definitions above.
viewID - -- only applicable in case of context choice 'current view or home window' contains the viewID
vtSelectedNodeTypes, - a Vector of the node types to search on.
vtSelectedAuthors, - a Vector of the author names to search on.
vtSelectedCodes, - a Vector of the code id to search on.
matchCodesCondition - -- (1) match any (2) match all codes listed
vKeywords - -- a Vector of the keywords to search on
matchKeywordCondition - -- (1) match any (2) match all keywords listed
attrib, - lists whether to match the keyword on the label, detail, or label and detail fields.
beforeCreationDate - java.util.Date , the creation date to search up to.
afterCreationDate - java.util.Date , the creation date to search from.
beforeModificationDate - java.util.Date , the modification date to search up to.
afterModificationDate - java.util.Date , the modification date to search from.
Returns:
an Enumeration of NodeSummary objects that match the search query.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

matchAttrib

private static java.lang.String matchAttrib(java.util.Vector vAttrib,
                                            java.util.Vector vKeywords,
                                            java.lang.String sConjunction)
Method to help generate a partial query for searching a set of attributes (columns) for any of the given keywords. for eg. for the attribute "Label", for keywords "test1" and "test2", and the conjunction "OR" the return value will be of the format "Label Like 'test1' OR Label Like 'test2'"

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
attrib, - a list of fields to search on.
vKeywords, - a Vector of the keywords to search on.
sConjunction, - whether to perfom and 'AND' or 'OR' search on those fields.
String, - the partial SQL string to search on for the given parameters.

matchAttrib

private static java.lang.String matchAttrib(java.util.Vector vKeywords)
Method to help generate a partial query for searching NodeType Added to correct the NodeType mismatch.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
vKeywords, - a Vector of the keywords to search on.
String, - the partial SQL string to search on for the given parameters.
